title: New: Disclosure – White Noise (Feat. AlunaGeorge)
content: The rise and rise of uber-talented teenagers Disclosure has seen them playing everywhere from Ibiza to Bestival, alongside charting at number 11 with their Sam Smith featuring single, Latch. With their debut album expected in March, they’ve teamed up with BBC Sound of 2013 nominees AlunaGeorge for their next single White Noise. Moving away from the garage-house sound experienced on earlier tracks, it’s an out-and-out pop hit, complete with club friendly hook and the alluring vocals of Aluna Francis.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
